message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you would find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130. What do you think?
I appreciate your time and effort in offering the product to me. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth more to me than that.  How about we meet in the middle at $115?

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $110, but I don't think I can go any higher. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
